## About TechCorp Solutions

TechCorp Solutions is a leading fintech company revolutionizing digital payments across India. We're building the next generation of financial services that empower millions of users.

## Job Description

We are looking for a **Senior Full Stack Developer** to join our core engineering team. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining scalable web applications that serve millions of users.

### Key Responsibilities

- Design and implement robust, scalable, and secure features using modern tech stack
- Lead technical discussions and mentor junior developers
- Collaborate with product managers and designers to define feature specifications
- Write clean, maintainable code with comprehensive test coverage
- Optimize application performance and ensure high availability
- Participate in code reviews and contribute to technical documentation

### Required Skills

- **5+ years** of experience in full-stack development
- Strong proficiency in **React.js** and modern JavaScript/TypeScript
- Extensive experience with **Node.js** and Express.js
- Deep understanding of **MongoDB** and database design principles
- Hands-on experience with **AWS** services (EC2, S3, Lambda, etc.)
- Proficiency in **GraphQL** and RESTful API design
- Experience with microservices architecture
- Strong understanding of web security best practices

### Nice to Have

- Experience with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes)
- Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines
- Contribution to open-source projects
- Experience in fintech domain

### What We Offer

- Competitive salary and stock options
- Flexible working hours and remote work options
- Health insurance for you and your family
- Learning and development budget
- MacBook Pro and ergonomic workspace setup

## About GlobalTech India

GlobalTech India is the Indian arm of a Fortune 500 technology company, focusing on building world-class products for global markets. Our Hyderabad office is a center of excellence for frontend innovation.

## Role Overview

We're seeking a talented **Frontend Engineer** specializing in React to create exceptional user experiences for our enterprise products used by millions globally.

### What You'll Do

- Build responsive, performant web applications using React and modern JavaScript
- Implement pixel-perfect UI components based on design specifications
- Collaborate with backend engineers to integrate APIs
- Write unit and integration tests to ensure code quality
- Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability
- Participate in agile ceremonies and contribute to sprint planning

### Essential Requirements

- **3-5 years** of hands-on experience with React.js
- Strong proficiency in **JavaScript ES6+** and modern web standards
- Experience with state management using **Redux** or similar libraries
- Solid understanding of **CSS3**, **HTML5**, and responsive design
- Experience with testing frameworks like **Jest** and React Testing Library
- Understanding of web accessibility standards (WCAG)
- Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail

### Preferred Qualifications

- Experience with TypeScript
- Knowledge of Next.js or similar frameworks
- Familiarity with design systems and component libraries
- Experience with performance optimization techniques
- Understanding of SEO principles

### Benefits

- Industry-leading compensation
- Flexible hybrid work model (3 days office, 2 days remote)
- Annual performance bonuses
- Professional development opportunities
- International collaboration opportunities

## About StartupX

StartupX is a fast-growing edtech startup transforming how students learn and prepare for competitive exams. We're backed by top-tier VCs and are scaling rapidly across India.

## The Role

We're looking for a passionate **Backend Engineer** to help us scale our platform to serve millions of students. You'll work with cutting-edge technologies and have a direct impact on our product.

### Responsibilities

- Design and develop scalable backend services using Python and Django
- Build and maintain RESTful APIs for mobile and web applications
- Optimize database queries and improve system performance
- Implement caching strategies using Redis
- Work with DevOps team to deploy and monitor applications
- Write clean, testable, and well-documented code

### Requirements

- **2-4 years** of experience in backend development
- Strong expertise in **Python** and **Django** framework
- Experience with **PostgreSQL** and database optimization
- Knowledge of **Redis** for caching and session management
- Familiarity with **Docker** and containerization
- Experience building **REST APIs** and understanding of API best practices
- Understanding of software design patterns and principles

### Good to Have

- Experience with message queues (RabbitMQ, Celery)
- Knowledge of microservices architecture
- Familiarity with AWS services
- Experience with GraphQL
- Understanding of data structures and algorithms

### Why Join Us

- Early-stage equity options
- Work directly with founders
- Fast-paced learning environment
- Flexible work hours
- Monthly team outings and hackathons

## About CloudFirst Technologies

CloudFirst Technologies is a cloud consulting firm helping enterprises migrate and optimize their infrastructure. We work with Fortune 1000 companies to modernize their technology stack.

## Position Summary

We're seeking an experienced **DevOps Engineer** to join our cloud infrastructure team. You'll be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining cloud-native solutions for our enterprise clients.

### Key Responsibilities

- Design and implement CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitLab CI
- Manage and optimize Kubernetes clusters for production workloads
- Automate infrastructure provisioning using Terraform and CloudFormation
- Monitor system performance and implement logging solutions
- Collaborate with development teams to improve deployment processes
- Implement security best practices and compliance requirements
- Provide on-call support for production systems

### Required Skills & Experience

- **4-6 years** of experience in DevOps/SRE role
- Strong expertise in **AWS** services (EC2, ECS, RDS, S3, etc.)
- Hands-on experience with **Kubernetes** in production
- Proficiency in **Docker** and container orchestration
- Experience with **Terraform** for infrastructure as code
- Strong scripting skills in **Python** or Bash
- Experience with **Jenkins** or similar CI/CD tools
- Understanding of networking, security, and Linux administration

### Preferred Qualifications

- AWS certifications (Solutions Architect, DevOps Engineer)
- Experience with monitoring tools (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK stack)
- Knowledge of GitOps practices
- Experience with service mesh (Istio, Linkerd)
- Understanding of cloud cost optimization

### What We Offer

- Competitive compensation with performance bonuses
- Opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies
- Cloud certification sponsorship
- Flexible work arrangements
- Comprehensive health coverage

## About DataMinds Analytics

DataMinds Analytics is a leading data intelligence company helping businesses make data-driven decisions. We process billions of data points daily to provide actionable insights to our clients.

## The Opportunity

We're looking for a skilled **Data Engineer** to join our data platform team. You'll build and maintain data pipelines that power analytics for some of India's largest companies.

### What You'll Do

- Design and build scalable data pipelines using Apache Spark
- Develop ETL workflows using Apache Airflow
- Build real-time data streaming solutions with Kafka
- Optimize data storage and retrieval in data lakes and warehouses
- Collaborate with data scientists to implement ML pipelines
- Ensure data quality and implement data governance practices
- Monitor and troubleshoot data pipeline issues

### Must-Have Skills

- **3-6 years** of experience in data engineering
- Strong programming skills in **Python** and **SQL**
- Hands-on experience with **Apache Spark** for large-scale data processing
- Experience with workflow orchestration using **Apache Airflow**
- Knowledge of **AWS** data services (S3, EMR, Glue, Redshift)
- Experience with streaming data using **Kafka** or similar technologies
- Understanding of data modeling and warehouse concepts
- Strong problem-solving and analytical skills

### Nice to Have

- Experience with Databricks or similar platforms
- Knowledge of machine learning pipelines
- Familiarity with data visualization tools
- Experience with Delta Lake or similar technologies
- Understanding of data security and privacy regulations

### Perks & Benefits

- Competitive salary with annual increments
- Work with cutting-edge big data technologies
- Learning and development programs
- Health and wellness benefits
- Hybrid work model available
